DOC.brief_summary: Almost patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ( T1DM ) need insulin treatment permanently . For selected patient unable achieve glycaemic target subcutaneous ( SC ) insulin treatment , continuous intraperitoneal ( IP ) insulin infusion third-line alternative . Previous study demonstrate continuous intraperitoneal insulin infusion ( CIPII ) use implantable pump device improve glycaemic control quality life patient 'brittle ' T1DM . Nevertheless , literature compare IP SC insulin treatment scarce . The primary objective study compare effect IP insulin delivery SC insulin delivery.The null hypothesis ( H0 ) current study hold inferiority CIPII compare SC insulin regard long-term glycaemic control . The alternative hypothesis ( H1 ) inverse : CIPII non-inferior SC insulin . In summary , H0 : CIPII inferior SC insulin treatment H1 : CIPII inferior SC insulin treatment This investigator initiate , open label prospective matched-control study non-inferiority design . The trial duration 36 week conduct single-centre ( Isala Clinics , Zwolle ) . If non-inferiority establish superiority analysis perform .
